verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [V: hailed] [ARG1: the heroism of an Indiana science teacher who stopped a shooting inside his classroom] .
President Trump on Saturday hailed the heroism of [ARG0: an Indiana science teacher] [R-ARG0: who] [V: stopped] [ARG1: a shooting inside his classroom] .
